title: Verify password acceptance with exactly 12 characters
preconditions: User is on registration/password reset screen
steps: 1. Enter valid password with exactly 12 characters (e.g. 'Password1234')
expected_results: System accepts the password without errors

title: Verify password rejection with 11 characters
preconditions: User is on registration/password reset screen
expected_results: System displays error message about minimum 12 character requirement

title: Verify password acceptance with more than 12 characters
preconditions: User is on registration/password reset screen
expected_results: System accepts the password without errors

title: Verify empty password rejection
preconditions: User is on registration/password reset screen
expected_results: System displays error message about required field and minimum length

title: Verify password with leading/trailing spaces handling
preconditions: User is on registration/password reset screen
steps: 1. Enter password with 12 characters plus spaces (e.g. '  Pass1234word  ')
expected_results: System either trims spaces and accepts valid length or rejects with appropriate message
